l: If I move too quick past you, I would think it's my reflection

Wish you could build me a cute apartment
One-bedroom right where your heart is
I wonder when they see just one, do they see us two?
We're meant to be, but not yet
Caught the scent of your shampoo

You could be a killer who's on the loose
The next day, I'll end up on the news
Don't see the light inside my head now
s: All I Really Want Is You

l: You take my hand like there's a way out
s: All I Really Want Is You

l:
I can't decide if it's the way that you smile
Or flick your hair to the side
Or just that look in your eyes
But in my dreams I seem to be more honest

And you paint a picture in my head
But I can only make out silhouettes

You say you'll stay with me forever
But I think forever doesn't seem like it's enough
Cats on the ceiling, the floorboards are breathing
The sun started bleeding, the sky's tangerining
And all I remember before you was a blur
The stars were confetti, my legs turned to jelly
My lips start to stutter, I trip on the covers
